name: Cinnamon Sweet Potato Slices
author: JanHomeCookin
summary: Wonderful slightly sweet baked potato slices. Ingredients amounts are only a suggestion. I always keep a cinnamon/sugar blend on hand.
ingredients: 4 medium sweet potatoes, peeled and sliced 1/2 inch thick
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Spray a baking sheet with cooking spray
Arrange sweet potato slices on the baking sheet
Mix the sugar and cinnamon in a small bowl, and sprinkle 1/2 over the potatoes
Bake 15 minutes in the preheated oven
Turn, brush with remaining butter, and sprinkle with remaining cinnamon and sugar
Continue baking 15 minutes, or until tender
